getting-started.name: Getting Started
getting-started.title: Getting Started Guide
getting-started.content:
# Getting Started

Welcome to the component library. This guide will help you get up and running.

## Installation

```bash
npm install my-component-library
```

## Usage

Import components and use them in your application.

theming.name: Theming
theming.title: Theming and Customization
theming.content:
# Theming

Learn how to customize the look and feel of components using our theming system.

## Theme Provider

Wrap your app with the ThemeProvider.
